attributes.action: Try David Cameron for War crimes against Humanity.
attributes.background: Air strikes in Syria will only fuel the terrorism of tomorrow. The killing of innocent men, women and children is not the path we should take. We call ourselves civilised but we are barbaric. David Cameron should be taken to trial for war crimes against humanity.

rejection.details:
Trials for war crimes are the responsibility of the International Criminal Court (ICC). You can find out more about the ICC here:

https://www.icc-cpi.int/en_menus/icc/Pages/default.aspx
